column1: Little Goat Diner////Avoid waiting in line and walk into Little Goat Bread
column2: where you can pick up a quick sandwich
column3: pastry or loaf of bread. Stopped in today and got an everything bagel with roasted cauliflower
column4: cheddar cheese and scallion schmear. The bagel was different from the norm but still delicious. I absolutely love the cream cheese schmear as it reminded me of a veggie cream cheese pumped up with flavor. Can't wait to go back and try some more things!
